name: vue2-in-vue3
description: This example demos a vue3 application loading remote vue2 component.`vue3` app depends on a component exposed by `vue2` app.

scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm start & wait-on http-get://localhost:3002/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress-e2e/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress-e2e/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/tests/*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
